CardinalityDefinition.description: Constraints on the amount of the XDS folder or document in order to support that structured document in the electronic health record system.

unique.description: The value 'true' means that solely one document/folder with the availablility status 'approved' is allowed to be registered with the given metadata combination. False means that multiple instances may be submitted.

deprecatedFrom.description: The following value is deprecated and should not be used from this date on. Useage of alternative value with same name instead is recommended
The following value is deprecated and should not be used from this date on. Usage of alternative value with same name instead is recommended.

version.description: The version of the document format.

name.description: The name of the specific document.

description.description: The description of the specific document.

canonicalUrl.description: A canonical URL of the structure definiton of the specific document.

implementationArtifact.description: This usage specification is not intended for verifying structured documents.

maxDocumentHistory.description: Defines the maximum amount of deprecated elements to be kept in a XDS RPLC chain (approved document does not count). Oldest entries may be deleted when this limit gets exeeded

deidentification.description: Provides all information to de-identify (anonymize) a FHIR document of the associated FHIR profile. All FHIR elements addressed by a FHIRPath in the list 'allowList' shall be applied in order to de-identify the document without changing its content.

name.description: The technical name of the structured document.

description.description: The overall description of the structured document.

igVersion.description: Version information of the Implementation Guideline file

guidelineDefinition.description: A link to the (FHIR) implementation guideline including its version.

validFromDate.description: Date from which the structured document is accepted (upload/download) by ePA-server.

clientReadOnlyFromDate.description: Date from which the structured document is accepted (only download) by ePA-server. The upload is rejected by ePA-server

type.description: The collection type of the structured document - either 'mixed', 'uniform' or 'atomic'.

DeidentificationDefinition.description: a list of fhir path elements arranged as list of paths for each possible profile

fhir.description: Resource profile specific list of fhir path entries defining allowed elements for research data submission. An addressed element shall appear in a pseudonymized document with the same path and including all child elements.
